content: pallene is a loose drop shoulder sweater worked from the bottom up in an all over lace motif with its basic construction it s a fun layering piece for lace lovers small repeats and simple motifs keep the project engaging while providing a neat and detailed look in a fine gauge the lace motifs are charted and made of simple eyelets decreases and mock cables with some patterning worked on the ws for the upper body this creates a rewarding delicate and customizable light garment to be worn in the transitioning seasons **sizes ** 1 2 / 3 / 4 5 6 / 7 / 8 all measurements are those of the finished sweater see last pictures for schematic and complete measurements finished bust circ 96 106 / 118 / 130 142 154 / 166 / 178 cm 37 ¾ 41 ¾ / 46 ½ / 51 ¼ 56 60 ½ / 65 ¼ / 70 choose a size with 20 cm 7 ¾ positive ease at bust shown in size 2 on a 90 cm 35 ½ bust **yarn ** you will need 1025 1140 / 1250 / 1380 1500 1650 / 1800 / 1990 meters 1120 1245 / 1370 / 1510 1640 1805 / 1970 / 2180 yards of fingering weight yarn the sample is knit with the woolly skein chickadee 350 m 383 yds / 100 g in yasu **needles ** main fabric 3 mm us 2 5 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round ribbing 2 5 mm us 1 5 circular needles with appropriate length to knit in the round or size required to get gauge **gauge ** 27 sts x 40 row / rnds per 10 cm 4 with larger needles in lace motif after blocking to swatch cast-on 43 sts and work chart a page 9 for a minimum of 10 times be mindful of how much your yarn might grow over the full sweater once blocked **notions ** stitch markers tapestry needle and scissors scrap yarn to place sts on hold row counter recommended **techniques used ** bottom up drop shoulder sweater body worked straight in the round to the armholes front and back upper body worked flat separately wide scoop neckline shoulders shaped with german short row sleeves picked up and worked straight in the round slightly gathered before cuffs lace knitting following multiple charts at the same time small motifs with eyelets simple decreases and mock cables lace pattern partially created on the ws on the upper body maintaining motif in pattern while decreasing for the neckline twisted ribbing collar hem and cuffs lace is charted only ------------------------------------------------------------------ pallene est un pull fluide à épaules
